message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product for a limited time at a steal! I think you'll find $200 to be a very fair price.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $120 is a bit too low for me. Could you do $180?  I'm confident you'll find it's worth every penny.
I'm still interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.
